FuncDef: The display license esn command displays the equipment serial number (ESN) of a device. The display license esn command displays the equipment serial number (ESN) of a device.
ExtraInfo: To use a function controlled by a license file, you need to apply for a license file. When applying for a new license file, you need to enter the ESN as the key information. The ESN uniquely identifies a device component. After running the display license esn command, you can view the ESN of the device.
